casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Alphonzo PEARCY, Jr. No. 284P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Alphonzo Pearcy, Jr., Pro Se. A. Pluchos, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 27th day of May 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
